description:
Keiji reflects on the long history he shares with Toyotomi. Meanwhile, Sanada is allowed an opportunity to get to know Miyamoto and Shimazu better, and also gains some surprising insight into Mori.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Sad Reunion with a Friend: Memory of the Day Etched with Blinding Obsession
Tomogaki to no Kanashiki Saikai: Moushuu Kizamareshi Hi no Kioku
友垣との哀しき再会 猛執刻まれし日の記憶
